briefTitle: LymphoVenous Anastomosis to Prevent Breast Cancer Related Lymphedema
officialTitle: Lymfo-Veneuse Anastomosen Ter Preventie Van Lymphoedeem
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The volume via circumferential measurements: swelling < 5%
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* lymph node + breast cancer requiring dissection

Exclusion Criteria:

* previous lymphedema
* BMI \>35
